resources.string: "No Internet Access Detected, won't automatically reconnect."
Not connected to file transfer server
Connected to device for Internet access
Sharing local Internet connection with device
Pairing grants access to your contacts and call history when connected.
"Couldn't pair with %1$s because of an incorrect PIN or passkey."
Limit the maximum CPU performance to conserve battery life and lower device temperature.
Sharing Windows PC internet via USB cable
1. Open network connections on your Windows PC.
2. Right-click the connection that you want to share, and then click properties.

"3. Click the sharing tab, and select 'Allow other network users to connect through this computer's internet connection'(choose newly added netork which represents USB internet if 'Home networking connection' appears)."
Selected Wi-Fi protected setup mode to proceed
Please input the directory name which you want to create!
Please input the other directory name, this one does exist
Please input the as certificate name
The SDCard does not has the AS certificate, please checke it!
The as certificate format is wrong! Please intall right as certificate
The user certificate format is wrong! Please intall right user certificate
Please input the user certificate name
Please input the user certificate name
Touch a network to connect to it
"You can't configure an EAP WLAN connection during setup. After setup, you can do that in Settings > Wireless & networks."
Connecting can take a few minutes…

Touch Next" to continue with setup.
Touch "Back to connect to a different WLAN network.
"The exclusion list you typed isn't properly formatted. Type a comma-separated list of excluded domains."
You need to fill the port field.
The port field must be empty if the host field is empty.
The HTTP proxy is used by the browser but may not be used by the other apps.
Number of PPP reset since boot:
Auto switch to data connect when WLAN is unavailable
You need to draw your unlock pattern to confirm credential installation.
Type the password for credential storage.
The password must have at least 8 characters.
Incorrect password. You have one more chance before credential storage is erased.
Incorrect password. You have %1$d more chances before credential storage is erased.
You need to set a lock screen PIN or password before you can use credential storage.
Set behavior when an emergency call is placed
Try to connect 3G network because of the poor signal of the current WLAN.
"Can't tether when USB storage is in use"
Automatically connect to available networks with a Wi‑Fi Assistant.
%1$s automatically connects you to the best available Wi‑Fi
%1$s manages your device and doesn’t allow modifying or deleting this Wi-Fi network. For more information, contact your administrator.
Set up & manage wireless access points
Notify whenever a public network is available
"Don't use a WLAN network unless it has a good Internet connection"
Only use networks that have a good Internet connection
Let Google location service and other apps scan for networks, even when WLAN is off

"To improve location accuracy and for other purposes, Google and other apps may scan for nearby networks, even when Wi-Fi is off. If you don't want this to happen, go to Advanced > Scanning always available."
"Apps may scan for nearby networks, even when Wi-Fi is off. If you don't want this to happen, go to Advanced > Scanning always available."
There was a problem changing the setting
Minimize battery usage when WLAN is on
To see available networks, turn WLAN on.
"You don't have permission to change the WLAN network."
To complete setup, your tablet needs access to WLAN. After setup, you can switch between cellular data and WLAN.
Press the WLAN Protected Setup button on your router. It may be called \"WPS\" or contain this symbol:
Enter pin %1$s on your WLAN router. The setup can take up to two minutes to complete.
WPS succeeded. Connecting to the network…
WPS is already in progress and can take up to two minutes to complete
WPS failed. Please try again in a few minutes.
The wireless router security setting (WEP) is not supported
The wireless router security setting (TKIP) is not supported
Another WPS session was detected. Please try again in a few minutes.

"To improve location accuracy and for other purposes, %1$s wants to turn on network scanning, even when Wi-Fi is off.
Allow this for all apps that want to scan?"
To turn this off, go to Advanced in the overflow menu.
%1$s requires you to sign in online before you connect to the network.
WARNING: if you skip WLAN, your phone will only use cellular data for initial downloads and updates. To avoid possible data charges, connect to WLAN.

"If you skip Wi‑Fi:
"
Your phone won’t have an Internet connection."
"
You won’t get software updates until you connect to the Internet."
"
You can’t activate device protection features at this time.
The phone was unable to connect to this WLAN network.
Specify the frequency range of operation
There was a problem setting the frequency band.
Type a network prefix length between 0 and 32.
If you disconnect, your connection with %1$s will end.
If you disconnect, your connection with %1$s and %2$s other devices will end.
Do you want to cancel invitation to connect with %1$s?
Use cellular connection to provide WLAN network
AndroidAP WPA2 PSK portable WLAN hotspot
"Sharing this phone's Internet connection to 1 device"
"Sharing this phone's Internet connection to %1$d devices"
Unable to write data to NFC tag. If the problem persists, try a different tag
NFC tag is not writable. Please use a different tag.
Could not find certification for current connecting AP
Please turn off Airplane mode to use EAP-SIM/AKA
You must insert a sim card to use EAP-SIM/AKA
You must select a sim slot to use EAP-SIM/AKA
Enable data access over Mobile network
Auto choose a better Wi-Fi network while scanning to join when connected
Tethering settings are not available for this user
Carrier data accounting may differ from your device.
Day of month to reset data usage cycle:
No apps used data during this period.
Disable background data on cellular networks.
To restrict background data for this app, first set a cellular data limit.

"This feature may cause an app that depends on background data to stop working when only cellular networks are available.
You can find more appropriate data usage controls in the settings available within the app."
"Restricting background data is possible only when you've set a cellular data limit."

"Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your phone.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on the phone to the web. A Google Account works this way."
"This will conserve data and battery usage, but you'll need to sync each account manually to collect recent information. And you won't receive notifications when updates occur."

"Your phone will turn off cellular data once it reaches the limit you set.
Since data usage is measured by your phone, and your carrier may account for usage differently, consider setting a conservative limit."
"If you restrict background cellular data, some apps and services won't work unless you're connected to Wi‑Fi."

"If you restrict background cellular data, some apps and services won't work unless you're connected to Wi‑Fi.
This setting affects all users on this phone."
"%2$s: about %1$s used, as measured by your phone. Your carrier's data usage accounting may differ."
Metered networks are treated like cellular when background data is restricted. Apps may warn before using these networks for large downloads.
To select metered networks, turn Wi‑Fi on.
Carrier data accounting may differ from your device.
Reset network SSID, security and password to default ( out-of-box configuration for WPS )
"Measured by your phone, your carrier's data speed accounting may differ."
Wi-Fi protected setup failed, try again.
Always on VPN has already been enabled for connection.
